Bases: ModelAdmin

Admin interface for the EmergencyService model.

Attributes: - list_display (list): Fields to be displayed in the list view. - list_filter (list): Fields available for filtering in the list view. - search_fields (list): Fields that can be searched from the search box.

list_filter = ['service_type']

emergency.models module

class emergency.models.EmergencyService(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Represents available emergency services with their details.

Attributes: - SERVICE_CHOICES (list): List of available emergency services. - service_type (CharField): The type of service (Ambulance or Paramedics). - cost (IntegerField): Cost associated with the service. - ETA (CharField): Estimated Time of Arrival for the service.

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

SERVICE_CHOICES = [('Ambulance', 'Ambulance'), ('Paramedics', 'Paramedics')]

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

emergencyservicerequest_set

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

class emergency.models.EmergencyServiceRequest(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Represents a patient’s request to utilize an emergency service.

Attributes: - PENDING (str): Constant for ‘Pending’ status. - APPROVED (str): Constant for ‘Approved’ status. - REJECTED (str): Constant for ‘Rejected’ status. - STATUS_CHOICES (list): List of available status choices. - patient (ForeignKey): Reference to the User who made the request. - service (ForeignKey): Reference to the requested emergency service. - request_date (DateTimeField): Date and time when the request was made. - status (CharField): The status of the request.

APPROVED = 'Approved'

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

emergency.tests module

emergency.views module

emergency.views.emergency_services_view(request)[source]

View to handle emergency services.

If the method is POST, validate the form and process the request. On form validation, the user is redirected to a confirmation page. Once the user confirms, a new request for emergency service is created. If the method is GET, display the list of available emergency services.

Args: - request (HttpRequest): The request object.

Returns: HttpResponse: Rendered HTML page.
